scripts.watch: npx shadow-cljs watch app browser-test karma-test
scripts.test: npx shadow-cljs compile test && node out/node-tests.js
scripts.release: PUPPETEER_SKIP_CHROMIUM_DOWNLOAD=true npm install react react-dom create-react-class && npx shadow-cljs release app && npx workbox injectManifest workbox-config.js && clojure -X bhatkhande-editor.sitemap/spit-sitemap
scripts.build-report: npx shadow-cljs run shadow.cljs.build-report app target/build-report.html
scripts.dev-and-test: concurrently "npm run dev" "wait-on http://localhost:8280 && npx run test:puppeteer"
